# Myark

> Myark is India's leading education discovery platform that curates verified scholarships, olympiads, competitions, entrance exams, and workshops for school students (classes 1-12).

Myark helps Indian students and parents discover educational opportunities with detailed eligibility criteria, important dates, preparation resources, and application guidance.

## Core Features

- **Opportunity Discovery**: Browse 500+ curated scholarships, olympiads, competitions, and entrance exams
- **Smart Search & Filters**: Find opportunities by class, category, deadline, and eligibility
- **Personalized Recommendations**: AI-powered opportunity suggestions based on student profile
- **Calendar Integration**: Track deadlines with an interactive opportunity calendar
- **Practice Quizzes**: Prepare for exams with topic-wise practice tests
- **Career Finder**: Explore career paths with an interactive career exploration tool

## Content Categories

- Scholarships (merit-based, need-based, government, private)
- Olympiads (science, mathematics, coding, language)
- Entrance Exams (NTSE, KVPY, JEE, NEET preparation)
- Competitions (essay writing, art, innovation challenges)
- Workshops & Programs (summer camps, bootcamps, skill development)
- AI & Robotics programs for students

## Target Audience

- Indian school students (Classes 1-12)
- Parents and guardians
- Teachers and school counselors
- Educational institutions

## Available for Schools

Myark offers dedicated solutions for schools including bulk student onboarding, custom opportunity curation, and administrative dashboards.

## Technical Information

- **Tech Stack**: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Firebase, TailwindCSS
- **Sitemap**: https://myark.in/sitemap.xml
- **API**: RESTful API (not for public consumption)

## Contact

- Website: https://myark.in
- Twitter: @getmyark
- Category: Education
